short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All your precise positioning applications, services, and data in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MAGNET is Topcon’s suite of applications for the surveying, construction, and civil industries. MAGNET increases productivity through the collaboration and management of office and field data, in the cloud. From the intuitive user interface of the MAGNET Field mobile application, and the power of the cloud-linked MAGNET Office processing and modeling applications, to the web-browser-based MAGNET Enterprise, MAGNET solutions provide a new increased level of productivity. With two options of purchase, full license pay today, or monthly subscription, MAGNET is the solution for you.

• Collaborate in the cloud
• Instant chat messaging
• Real-time positions from the field
• Asset management
• Cloud storage
• Graphical easy-to-learn interface
• Future-proof through subscriptions

Field and Office products:

• MAGNET Field
• MAGNET Office

Subscriptions are available in the MAGNET Enterprise Store, or from a local Topcon dealer.

Locate and contact a Topcon dealer near you:

http://www.topconpositioning.com/dealer-locator
